Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T1.OCORHIST, T1.OPERACAO, T1.SITCONTB, T1.COD_PRODUTO, T1.VAL_OPERACAO, T1.SITUACAO, T1.NUMREC, T1.SITCONTB, T1.DTMOVTO, T1.CODPSVI, T1.CODSVI, T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO, T2.DESCRICAO_FUNCAO, T2.IND_TIPO_OPERACAO, T1.CODPSVI, T1.NUMREC, T3.CGCCPF, T3.CLIFOR, T3.DCOIRF, T3.DCOINSS, T3.DCOISS, T3.CEP, T3.CIDADE, T3.NOME, T3.TPPESSOA FROM seguros.v0histsini WHERE T1.OPERACAO = T2.OPERACAO AND T3.CGCCPF = :CGCCPF AND T3.TIPREG = '4' AND T3.CLIFOR = T1.CODPSVI AND T3.CODSVI_ISS = T1.CODSVI AND T1.SITCONTB IN ('1','2') AND T1.DTMOVTO >= :SI9GW01.DATA-INICIAL AND T1.DTMOVTO <= :SI9GW01.DATA-FINAL AND T2.IND_TIPO_OPERACAO IN ('IN','DE','HO','DS','HS') AND T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO IN ('IND', 'DPAG', 'HPAG', 'DSPAG', 'HSPAG') END SQL
